name: 2 - MyHunter
description:
MyHunter is a small basic Duck Hunt minigame made alone in about 1 week.

It is a 1rst year EPITECH (5years IT engineer school) project made on fedora 32 Linux using the CSFML library.

This project can also be git cloned/pulled from https://github.com/EpitechIT2020/B-MUL-100-REN-1-1-myhunter-dorian.ayoul.
